pages.text: They said: confused dreams and we do not know the interpretation of the (confused) dreams
And the one who was saved, remembered (Joseph) after a while and said: I tell you its interpretation, so send me (to Joseph)

Joseph, the honest one, explain to us about seven fat cows that seven skinny ones eat them, and seven green clusters and (seven) others dry, so that I may return to the people so that they may know (its interpretation)
He said: you will cultivate seven years as usual, and whatever you harvest you leave it in its clusters (to be stored), except a little that you eat
Then after that, seven hard years come, which you consume what you previously stored up for them, except a little that you save
Then after that, a year comes in which the people will be showered (with plenty of rain) and in which they press (juices of grapes and others)

And the king said: bring him to me. Then when the messenger came to him, he said: return to your master and ask him what the case of the women who cut their hands is? Indeed my Master knows their plot

He said (to the women): what was your business when you wanted to seduce Joseph? They said: God forbid, we do not know anything bad about him. The wife of the powerful one said: now the truth is cleared, I wanted to seduce him, and he is certainly truthful
(And Joseph said:) this was for him to know that I did not betray him in his absence, and indeed God does not guide the plot of the betrayers
